rows.label: tlk70000048_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I was worried about how my kids would
adjust to being brought here...

rows.label: tlk70000048_03_msg0002
rows.name:
But I shouldn't have been so anxious.
Kids can adapt to anything in a flash,
and the others helped a lot, too.

rows.label: tlk70000048_03_msg0003
rows.name:
My kids have been getting along
famously with Noowl and Ivan.
They eat together and everything.

rows.label: tlk70000048_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Those two lost their families, too, so
it was easy for my kids to relate to
them.

rows.label: tlk70000048_03_msg0005
rows.name:
As a father I'd rather they were by my
side at all times, but I think these
friendships have been good for them.

rows.label: tlk70000048_03_msg0006
rows.name: Ahh, if only Nelly were here...
